other_tests.findings: Identified a 637-kb duplication at Xp21.2 containing the DAX1 gene.
Established the genomic location of the extra copy of the duplication; only one signal was seen for the clone RP11â€“662D2 covering the DAX1 gene.
Confirmed the duplication and narrowed down the breakpoint regions.

other_tests.procedure_name: PCR amplification and sequencing of the duplication junction
other_tests.findings: Confirmed the location of the breakpoints 637-kb apart, consistent with a tandem head-to-tail duplication.
